content.query:
SELECT 
    l.City,
    l.Region,
    s.Description,
    SUM(h.QuantityOnHand) AS TotalInStock,
    SUM(s.Quantity) AS TotalItemsSold,
    AVG(s.Profit) AS AvgProfitOnSale,
    SUM(s.Profit) AS TotalProfit
FROM wwi.FactSale s 
INNER JOIN wwi.FactStockHolding h
    ON (s.StockItemKey = h.StockHoldingKey)
INNER JOIN wwi.DimCity l 
    ON (s.CityKey = l.CityKey)
WHERE 
   s.Profit > 100 AND s.Profit < 500 AND  h.QuantityOnHand > 0  
GROUP BY
    City,
    Region,
    Description
ORDER BY
    SUM(Profit) DESC,
    Region,
    City
